name: Remote Control Drone Simulator
description:
Time to take flight with all new rc sky viper drones game. Remote Control Drone Simulator is the latest Spy Drone Flight Simulator in which you have been assigned to perform secret spy agent duty. Take wings to keep your eye on crime gangsters and keep full record of their conversations. Control this rc plane as cool drone pilot, spy over underworld enemies and their wrong doings. Handle rc quadcopter smartly for endless flight and let your drone capture gangsters enemies’ secret plans. Record their video carefully via future drone rc and Make a phone call to 911 to handle the situation.

Remote Control Drone Simulator game features:

» Real rc drone plane sim
» Multiple camera angles views
» Thrilling drone flight missions
» Realistic flying games graphics
» Smooth control system of flying drone
» HQ sound effects
» Exciting drone racer flight simulator

Take futuristic 3D rc plane flight and let your drone fly through big city skies building spying over mafia and record their unlawful acts. Remote Control Drone Simulator has simple gameplay yet exciting to Learn fly drone in big city, above skyscrapers. Avoid crashing through all the hurdles and obstacles. In each level you will be assigned missions whereby you have to spy over gangsters as pro secret agent and amazing drone pilot accomplish your tasks successfully.


Tasks are not as easy as they might seem to be. Opponents are always high alert. So you have to keep hawks eye while controlling rc drone flying wings. There are various hoops, obstacles & hurdles that you need to cross smartly while spying over gangsters in drone games 2018.

Control rc quadcopter now and get ready for unlimited thrilling adventure in Remote Control Drone Simulator to accomplish criminal act mission in this 3D drone game. Dodge all that comes on your way. Don’t let them know that you are spying over them through absolute rc quadcopter drone racer flight. Keep looking at the time bar as you have to complete task within given time.

You are the best drone pilot. Set off now for super drone flying in this exciting and latest drone flight; all new rc 3d quadcopter game. Download now and be the amazing spy agent.
